en-US.summary: Sample skill to demonstrate Amazon Pay for digital use cases
examplePhrases: Alexa, open movie of the day
Alexa, ask movie of the day for 3 tickets
Alexa, start movie of the day
en-US.name: Movie of the day
en-US.description: Sample skill to demonstrate Amazon Pay for digital use cases
